description: Integrate and automate Keka HR platform features such as employee management, attendance, leave, payslip, and holiday data through a secure MCP server. Utilize OAuth2 authentication for safe access and leverage modular tools to streamline HR workflows. Deploy easily with Docker support for containerized environments.

kekaClientId.description: Client ID for your Keka application

kekaClientSecret.description: Client Secret for your Keka application

kekaRefreshToken.description: Refresh Token for your Keka application

capabilities.name: keka_get_attendance

capabilities.name: keka_get_leave_types

capabilities.name: keka_apply_leave

capabilities.name: keka_get_leave_balances

capabilities.name: keka_view_leave_history
